name: NewYorkStyleGuide
0:
”Alexa, open NewYork Style Guide”
”Alexa, ask NewYork Style Guide for the latest update”
”Alexa, start NewYork Style Guide”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: newyork style guide
des:
Listen to New York Style Guide where you can get the latest information in Fashion, Entertainment, Events, Beauty Tips, Lifestyle, Fashion Trends, and Celebrity News from around the world. 
We publish several times a day and you can also visit us at https://NewYorkStyleGuide.com

Try saying
"Alexa, open New York Style Guide"
"Alexa, ask New York Style Guide for the latest update"
"Alexa, start New York Style Guide"

You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". 

Thank you for your support,
-New York Style Guide Team
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
